title: Hamilton Beach Searing Grill 25360
description:
Removable hood, non-stick plates & drip tray are all dishwasher safe
    118 sq inch non-stick surface(6-8 servings)
    Get outdoor flavor...indoors—high searing temperature locks in juices & flavor
    Adjustable temperature control
    Power & preheat lights

asset.author: HamiltonBeachBrands
asset.description:
Removable hood, non-stick plates & drip tray are all dishwasher safe
    118 sq inch non-stick surface(6-8 servings)
    Get outdoor flavor...indoors—high searing temperature locks in juices & flavor
    Adjustable temperature control
    Power & preheat lights
http://www.hamiltonbeach.com/all-indoor-grills-searing-grill-25360.html

transcripts: Hi I'm Kara for Hamilton Beach and this is the Searing grill some of the best summer foods come off the grill from perfectly seared vegetables too juicy burgers these delicious foods are the hallmark of BBQ's pool parties and other warm weather gatherings with the Searing grill you can bring summer indoors anytime you want all year long the high 450 degree temperature locks in juices and flavors so your meals will taste fresh and look fabulous the 118 square inch cooking surface is plenty of room for preparing a meal for friends or family the adjustable temperature control means you can customize recipes just the way you like them plus the hood nonstick plate and drip tray are dishwasher-safe making great food even more convenient for our busy lives. The Searing grill from Hamilton Beach, now that's good thinking.
